import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Card, Table, Container, Row, Col, Form, Button , InputGroup, FormControl, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Accordion } from "react-bootstrap"; import { db, functions } from "../firebase"; // import {addNewAdmin} from './adminAction' const CreateAdmin = () => { const [admins, setAdmins] = useState([]); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const addAdminRole = functions.httpsCallable("addAdminRole"); useEffect(() => { db.collection("users").get() .then(snapshot=>{ let users = []; snapshot.docs.forEach(user=>{ users.push(user); }) setUsers([...users]); }) }, []) const handleAddNewAdmin = (e) => { const adminUser = users.find((email) => email == e.target.value); console.log(adminUser) addAdminRole(e.target.value).then((result) => { // db.collection("admins").add({ // }) console.log(adminUser) }) } return (

) } export default CreateAdmin
